=======
CHANGES
=======

1.1.0 (2010-12-23)
------------------

- Changes to support python 2.6

1.0.1 (2010-11-10)
------------------

- Removed the dependencies on zope.app.intid
- Changes to support zope.componetnt>=3.6.0
- Added skipkeys=True for simplejson encoder to prevent 
  raising a TypeError

1.0.0a (2009-08-20)
-------------------
- Initial release.
